text: Flag of Norfolk Island Norfolk Island competed at the 2015 Pacific Games in Port Moresby, Papua New Guinea from 4 to 18 July 2015. Norfolk Island listed 13 competitors as of 19 June 2015. == Athletics== Norfolk Island qualified 1 athlete in track and field. ===Women=== ;Field events {|class=wikitable style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Distance !Position |-style=text- align:center |style=text-align:left| Brianna Stephens |style=text-align:left rowspan=1| Hammer throw |42.77 | |} ==Golf== Norfolk Island qualified 4 male golfers for the games. {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%;" |- !rowspan=2|Athlete !rowspan=2|Event !Round 1 !Round 2 !Round 3 !Round 4 !colspan=3|Total |-style="font-size:95%" !Score !Score !Score !Score !Score !Par !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Shane Evans |align=left rowspan=4| Men's individual |95 |92 |91 |94 |372 | |51 |-align=center |align=left|Scott Greenwood |93 |86 |91 |95 |365 | |50 |-align=center |align=left|Thomas Greenwood |83 |84 |83 |90 |340 | |37 |-align=center |align=left|Beau Magri |90 |89 |86 |85 |350 | |=41 |} == Lawn bowls== Norfolk Island has qualified 6 athletes. *Tess Evans *Ryan Dixon *Matt Bigg *Trev Gow *Gary Bigg *Phil Jones ==Shooting== Norfolk Island has qualified 2 athletes. ;Men * Doug Creek Image:Bronze medal icon.svg – 10 m air pistol male, Image:Gold medal icon.svg – 25 m pistol mixed. * Kevin Coulter Image:Silver medal icon.svg – 10 m air pistol male. ==References== Category:2015 in Norfolk Island Category:Nations at the 2015 Pacific Games Category:Norfolk Island at the Pacific Games
title: Norfolk Island at the 2015 Pacific Games
